Text: I've been hoping this movie would surface on TPB, without much hope, so you can imagine my pleasure to find it here -- looking forward to watching this (big Maggie Smith fan). Many thanks indeed.
I see you have a lot of good movies -- good to find someone with a taste for something other than the latest Hollywood offering.
I'm a big devotee of The Haunting (1963), Judith sorta reminds me of Eleanor. I'm trying to think of what to post next... any suggestions?
